EmailTemplate.subject: BYOD to your online meetings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, Did you know that in the past 10 years, BYOD has increased 4X among enterprise organizations? With the continuing growth of remote workers and the exponential rise of mobility, a new landscape for modern business collaboration is here to stay. In working with over 40,000 customers worldwide and 75% of the Fortune 100™, PGi has found 3 key challenges common to enterprise organizations:
-iPads, tablets and smartphones integrating into existing technology platforms (BYOD)
-High cost and low usage of video telepresence rooms versus the ease of use of HD video conferencing tools
-Fragmented approach of current audio, web and video conferencing solutions
To learn more about the hottest trends impacting collaboration crowdsourcing, consumerization of IT, mobility, social media and globalization click here to read The Future of Business Collaboration eBook: http://cdn2.hubspot.net/hub/147341/file-17879893-pdf/docs/ebook-futureofcollaboration.pdf
PGi enables companies to consolidate their entire organization's audio, web and video conferencing needs making it easier to meet anywhere, anytime and on virtually any device.
I'd like the opportunity to share with you how PGi's award winning collaboration solutions can meet your needs. Please let me know your availability for a 15-minute virtual meeting by contacting me at the information below; otherwise I will follow up with you next week. Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
P.S. If you are not the correct person to speak to about collaboration solutions within your organization, it would be great if you would direct me to the correct individual. Thanks in advance for your help!
